name: Shift (itch) (Vostn)
description:
A simple, atmospheric rendition of the classic shell game. Follow the ball as it shifts around, hidden beneath a cup, and make the right selection.

Made in about a weeks worth of afternoons last August. I had just a couple of weeks prior to this made a particularly poor and effortless attempt at making a game, and was kind of disappointed with myself, and so developed this in somewhat of a haze of skittish and unfocussed polishing of a simple concept. I was personally quite proud of the result, but I haven't made a game since, because I felt like lightning struck with this, and I've been afraid of disappointing myself again, by expecting to make something like this a second time.

Now you get to enjoy it!
